page.title: 14Games Children Play in E.Cdr
page.content:
We surveyed 100 children in our school to find out their favourite games. Here is a list of our games in order of preference- British Bulldogs,Hidey, Dodgey Ball,Dripes,White Horse and Make up,Skipping,Tag,and Line Tig. {British Bulldogs:}one person goes IT and stands between 2 walls.Other players stand onto one side and run across.When the catcher catches one they say," 2,4,6,8,10, British Bulldogs caught and held."{ {Make up,Make up }is a game for girls.One girl stands at a wall and calls out, " Make up, Make up,kinds of animals or anything". For example if she calls" Lion"the girl who is IT runs back and forth twice and if you get there before her you say" Over."
by Eleanor Strathie ,Susan Taylor.
